communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear CIA:

This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act. Please produce all records related to James Campbell Scott. Dr. Scott was born in Mount Holly, New Jersey, USA on December 2, 1936 and died on July 19, 2024. A news obituary from the Washington Post (attached) notes the Agency’s interest in Dr. Scott and his writings.

PROOF OF DEATH:

Dr. Scott's news obituary from the Washington Post is attached.

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that you produce responsive records electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

Thank you very much.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz

Dear FBI:

This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act. Please produce all records related to James Campbell Scott. Dr. Scott was born in Mount Holly, New Jersey, USA on December 2, 1936 and died on July 19, 2024.

PROOF OF DEATH:

Dr. Scott's news obituary from the Washington Post is attached.

SCOPE OF SEARCH:

In addition to standard practices, please search the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices.

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that you produce responsive records electronically, by email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

Thank you very much.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the North Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

- The Police report for the arrest number 1907231 of Nicholas James Perry on 07/11/2024 at 06:19 AM

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Celeste Skygazer
